column4: doesn't that depend on where you're printing from? e.g. you said you get the options when you print from firefox, what about libreoffice?
yes, by libre it appear, but it not the same when I open by firefox...
yes, each app capable of printing has their own printer preferences
maybe I need a driver for this? reisio, what do you think?
you've already got your printer driver
ok... I will look for a driver for ubuntu
you said your printer prints just fine, that means you have the driver installed, you don't need to get another driver
but it should be a generic driver, nah?
because I dont have many option when I access my printer by System
how can I see my driver model?
so it's whatever is in cups
with fwl, web gateway, e-mail, and more...
